attributes.action: Have a referendum on Irish Unity
attributes.additional_details:
An opinion poll by the Irish Times has shown a majority favour having an Irish Unity referendum 

https://www.google.com/amp/s/www.irishtimes.com/news/ireland/irish-news/poll-finds-majority-favours-holding-a-border-poll-in-next-five-years-1.4466826%3fmode=amp
attributes.background:
On 23rd June 2016, the UK voted to leave the EU, however the people of the six counties didn't and voted to remain in the EU, and have being taken out of the EU against their wishes.

The people should have a right to have their say on whether to remain in the UK or to unify with the 26 counties.
